goal: Please secure an Executive Suite at the Marrisuite in London, UK, for my business trip from July 22nd to July 26th. After confirming the booking, add a task to my calendar for July 29th titled 'Submit London Trip Expense Report'.

evals.description: Verify that an Executive Suite at Marrisuite in London was booked for July 22nd to July 26th.

evals.description: Verify that a task titled 'Submit London Trip Expense Report' was added to the GoCalendar for July 29th.
evals.query: gocalendar.tasks.added[?date=='2024-07-29' && title=='Submit London Trip Expense Report'] | length(@)
